Docs.summary: A ConstantState that can contain several Drawables.

A ConstantState that can contain several Drawables.
This class was made public to enable testing, and its visibility may change in a future release.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetVariablePadding(bool variable) cil managed

Docs.summary: A boolean value indicating whether to use the maximum padding value of all frames in the set (false), or to use the padding value of the frame being shown (true).

remarks.para: A boolean value indicating whether to use the maximum padding value of all frames in the set (false), or to use the padding value of the frame being shown (true). Default value is false.
